root.name: SingStar Norske Hits
root.description: TracklistA-Ha - The Sun Always Shines On TV Annie - Heartbeat Arne Schau Knudsen - Gal Av Lengsel Avril Lavigne - Sk8tr Boi Beyoncé - Crazy in Love Bigbang - Girl In Oslo The Clash -Should I Stay or Should I Go? David - Wild At Heart Dollie - Lenge Leve Livet DumDum Boys - Splitter Pine Hoobastank - The Reason Jan Eggum - På An Igjen Joss Stone - Super Duper Love (Are You Diggin' On Me?) Kaptein Sabeltann - Vi Seiler Vår Egen Sjø The Kids - Forelska i Lærer'n Kine - In The Air Tonight Kylie Minogue - In Your Eyes Manfred Mann - Do Wah Diddy Maria Mena - My Lullaby The Monroes - Sunday People Opus X - Loving You Girl Philip Sandra - Sommerflørt Robbie Williams - Let Me Entertain You Rune Rudberg - Ut Mot Havet The September When - Cries Like A Baby Sister Sledge - We Are Family Sputnik - Lukk Opp Din Hjertedør Tine - Vil Ha Deg Tom Jones -It's Not Unusual 11 of the songs on Singstar Norske Hits were from Singstar Popworld. The rest were Norwegian songs.
